alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Idaho County through 415 PM PDT... At 340 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 34 miles south of Lowell, or 41 miles southeast of Grangeville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red River Hot Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
